column4: why  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/ttf-bitstream-vera/+bug/11180  is still not fixed  (and others reported months ago)
talk to canonical.. everyone here is a ubuntu user just like you.. if you want to yell at someone, at least yell at someone that's making money of it =)
it has done that for me since the last 7 months
if you only want bugfree apps I don't really know what you can run.. ubuntu is definately out of the question..
this isn't really the place to discuss ubuntu's amount of bugs.. it's a support channel.. there are other channels for general discussion..
ok can you then comment on my bug report,
got a link to the bug report?
I can confirm the bug on Gutsy, 64 bit.. same behavious as the example
works nicely for me. I don't use fields that much
I think the server version doesn't install gnome/kde/xfce
but it is the same distro, only it installs less by default?
